openerSection: HSBC Visa Platinum Credit Card is an entry-level credit card offered by HSBC Bank. It comes with no joining and annual fee and welcomes its customers with exclusive benefits, including complimentary lounge access, up to Rs. 2,000 cashback, a 50% discount on Google Pay, etc. With this card, you earn 2 Reward Points on every Rs. 100 you spend and you earn 5x reward points once your total spends reach Rs. 4 lakhs in an anniversary year. Not only the reward points, but it also gives you an amazing opportunity to earn up to Rs. 1,000 cashback every year under its milestone benefits.

Moreover, you get exciting benefits from the partner brands, including the ‘Buy 1 get 1 Free' offer on BookMyShow and a discount of 10% on Tata Cliq, etc. Moreover, the fuel surcharge waiver, zero liability protection against a lost card are also among the key features of the card. To know more about the HSBC Visa Platinum Credit Card, keep reading:
